Options.Name: -o
Options.Description:
Output/destination directory to which you wish to save 
If omitted, only displays the raw list

Options.Name: -url
Options.ShortDescription: The URL of the archived web site.
Options.Description: The URL of the archived web site.

Options.Name: -from
Options.Description:
From timestamp. Limits the archived result SINCE this timestamp. 
Use 1 to 14 digit with the format: yyyyMMddhhmmss 
If omitted, retrieves results since the earliest timestamp available.
Options.Example:
wbm-dl -url http://example.com -from 20160201 
	wbm-dl -url http://example.com -from 2016 
	wbm-dl -url http://example.com -from 2016 -o c:/temp

Options.Name: -to
Options.Description:
To timestamp. Limits the archived result  UNTIL this timestamps. 
Use 1 to 14 digit with the format: yyyyMMddhhmmss 
If omitted, retrieves results until the latest timestamp available.
Options.Example:
wbm-dl -url http://example.com -to 20160201 
	wbm-dl -url http://example.com -from 2016 
	wbm-dl -url http://example.com -to 2016 -o c:/temp

Options.Name: -limit
Options.ShortDescription: Limits the first N or the last N results.
Options.Description: Limits the first N or the last N results. Negative number limits the last N results.
Options.Example:
wbm-dl -url http://example.com -to 20160201 
	wbm-dl -url http://example.com -from 2016 
	wbm-dl -url http://example.com -to 2016 -o c:/temp

Options.Name: -list
Options.Description: Displays the raw list. When used with -o will save the list
Options.Example:
wbm-dl -url http://example.com -to 20160201 
	wbm-dl -url http://example.com -from 2016 
	wbm-dl -url http://example.com -to 2016 -o c:/temp

Options.Name: -all
Options.Description: Retrieves all snapshots for each timestamp.  When omitted only retrieves one snapshot per each timestamp.
